description: Series of waterfalls, 3 in total, also nice swimming hole with large cliffs to jump from. Popular local spot.
directions: From Yarmouth follow the Evangeline trail to Meteghan, Take right on to Chemin Placide Comeau. Follow this rd and take a right on to Bangor Rd. Falls/ swimming hole are on the right around halfway through the road. Enjoy!
title: Montagne
